question: A man took a loan from a bank at the rate of 12% per annum at simple interest. After 3 years he had to pay Rs. 5400 as interest only for the period. The principle amount borrowed by him was:
explanation:
Let the principal be x.
$latex S.I.= \\frac{Principal\\times Rate\\times Time }{100}&s=1$
$latex =>5400=\\frac{x\\times 12\\times 13}{100}&s=1$
$latex =>x=\\frac{5400\\times 100}{12\\times 3}&s=1$
$latex =>x=Rs. 15000$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
